The Accounting Officer explained that the unit cost is provided for in the work plan, where we indicate the expected output and total cost, by inference the unit cost is obtainable and this is per the template of the budget system.

3.4 Implementation of quantified outputs I assessed the implementation of thirty five (35) outputs that were fully quantified with a total of seventy eight (78) activities worth UGX 2.498trillion and noted that; Nineteen (19) outputs were fully implemented, fourteen (14) outputs were partially achieved and two (2) outputs were not implemented at all Table 2; Showing level of implementation of Fully Quantified outputs Category of output No of outp uts % of imple ment ation No of Fully imple mente d activit ies No. Of partiall y implem ented activiti es No of activitie s that were not impleme nted Extent of implement ation of activities per category of output 19 54.3 33 0 0 100 14 40 10 22 11 50 Fully impleme nted outputs 1 Partially Impleme nted outputs 2
